title: BTS (방탄소년단) LOVE MYSELF Campaign Special Announcement
author: Big Hit Labels
description:
BTS LOVE MYSELF Campaign Continues!
방탄소년단 LOVE MYSELF 캠페인은 앞으로도 계속됩니다. 

함께 사랑 가득한 세상을 만들어가요.

LOVE MYSELF 캠페인에 대해 더 알고 싶다면 아래 웹사이트와 SNS 채널을 방문해 주세요.
To learn more about LOVE MYSELF campaign please visit below websites and social channels.

LOVE MYSELF Official Twitter
https://twitter.com/bts_love_myself​

LOVE MYSELF Official Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/bts_love_myself/

LOVE MYSELF Official Website
https://www.love-myself.org​

UNICEF #ENDviolence​
http://endviolence.unicef.or.kr​

#BTSLoveMyself​ #ENDviolence​ #BTS​ #방탄소년단​ #BigHitEntertainment #UNICEF​ #유니세프
